sentences: Alfoncius Dapot Parulian Nainggolan (born 23 May 1983) also known as Cas or Casanova Alfonso, is an Indonesian R&B singer.
R&B singer Cas, joined such other musicians as Manissedap, Sultan, Emil, Bembi, Rizki and Wizzow in 2006 to produce a solo album by the end of 2009.
He and Rianti Cartwright married on 17 September 2010 at Old St. Patrick's Cathedral, New York City.
They announced an expected first child in february 2020;
Cartwright gave birth to Cara Rose Kanaya, born on July 25, 2020.
